question: Who is World No. 1 in men’s tennis as per the recent ATP rankings?
explanation: Novak Djokovic is a Serbian professional tennis player who is currently ranked World No. 1 in men’s singles tennis by the Association of Tennis Professionals. He has won 14 Grand Slam titles, 5 ATP finals, 32 ATP World Tour Masters 1000 series titles and 12 ATP World Tour 500 tournaments.
